menu_list_no_source_warning_help.desc: Please use `hi list --setup <source-url>` setup source at first.
menu_list_no_source_warning_help.en: Please use `hi list --setup <source-url>` setup source at first.
menu_list_no_source_warning_help.cn: 请先使用 `hi list --setup <source-url>` 配置源。

menu_update_no_source_warning_help.desc: Please use `hi list --setup <source-url>` setup source at first.
menu_update_no_source_warning_help.en: Please use `hi list --setup <source-url>` setup source at first.
menu_update_no_source_warning_help.cn: 请先使用 `hi list --setup <source-url>` 配置源。

menu_publish_successed.desc: App already publish to local source, waiting for upload...
menu_publish_successed.en: App already publish to local source, waiting for upload...
menu_publish_successed.cn: App已经发布到本地源, 等待上传...

menu_desc.desc:
Hikit
You can use `hi -h` to get more help.
menu_desc.en:
Hikit
You can use `hi -h` to get more help.
menu_desc.cn:
Hikit
你可以使用 `hi -h` 获得更多帮助.

menu_list_desc.desc:
Use `hi list` can list all tools.
        Use `hi list --setup [list remote address]` can change list.
        Use `hi update` or `hi update --list` can update list.
menu_list_desc.en:
Use `hi list` can list all tools.
        Use `hi list --setup [list remote address]` can change list.
        Use `hi update` or `hi update --list` can update list.
menu_list_desc.cn:
使用 `hi list` 可以列出所有工具
        使用 `hi list --setup [list remote address]` 可以变更源.
        使用 `hi update` 或 `hi update --list` 可以更新源.

menu_list_setup_desc.desc: Setup a new list source. Only Support git.
menu_list_setup_desc.en: Setup a new list source. Only Support git.
menu_list_setup_desc.cn: 安装一个新的源, 暂时只支持git.

menu_search_help.desc: Use regular expressions to search app in list.
menu_search_help.en: Use regular expressions to search app in list.
menu_search_help.cn: 使用正则表达式在源中搜索app.

menu_search_desc.desc: Use `hi search [regex string]` can use regular expressions to search app in list.
menu_search_desc.en: Use `hi search [regex string]` can use regular expressions to search app in list.
menu_search_desc.cn: 使用 `hi search [regex string]` 可以使用正则表达式在源中搜索app.

menu_search_regex_desc.desc: The regex use to search apps.
menu_search_regex_desc.en: The regex use to search apps.

menu_show_desc.desc: Use `hi show [app name]` can show the app's infomation.
menu_show_desc.en: Use `hi show [app name]` can show the app's infomation.
menu_show_desc.cn: 使用 `hi show [app name]` 可以显示工具的信息.

menu_update_desc.desc:
use,
        hi update
        will update list automatically, install all default tools,
        and update all installed tools.

        use,
        hi update hi
        to update hikit.
                                           
        use,
        hi update [app name]
        to update app.

        use,
        hi update --all or hi update -a,
        Will update list, hikit and installed apps.
menu_update_desc.en:
use,
        hi update
        will update list automatically, 

        use,
        hi update hi
        to update hikit.
                                           
        use,
        hi update [app name]
        to update app.

        use,
        hi update --all or hi update -a,
        Will update list, hikit and installed apps.
menu_update_desc.cn:
使用,
        hi update
        会自动更新源.

        使用,
        hi update hi
        可以更新 hikit.
                                           
        使用,
        hi update [app name]
        来更新app.

        使用,
        hi update --all 或 hi update -a,
        会更新所有.

menu_uninstall_name_desc.desc: The app's name or a local app' path. Not necessary.
menu_uninstall_name_desc.en: The app's name or a local app' path. Not necessary.
menu_uninstall_name_desc.cn: 工具的名称。也可以没有。

menu_install_desc.desc:
Use `hi install [app name]`, can install the app.
        If use `hi install` directly inside the local app dir,
        can install app from local.
menu_install_desc.en:
Use `hi install [app name]`, can install the app.
        If use `hi install` directly inside the local app dir,
        can install app from local.
menu_install_desc.cn:
使用 `hi install [app name]`, 可以安装该工具.
        如果直接在工具源码根目录下使用 `hi install`,
        会从源码安装，仅拷贝命令的快捷方式.

menu_install_name_desc.desc: The app's name or a local app' path. Not necessary.
menu_install_name_desc.en: The app's name or a local app' path. Not necessary.
menu_install_name_desc.cn: 工具的名称。也可以没有。

menu_uninstall_desc.desc:
Use `hi uninstall [app name]`, can uninstall the app.
        also can run in a local app' dir, the same as `install`.
        Use `hi uninstall hikit`, can uninstall the hikit.
menu_uninstall_desc.en:
Use `hi uninstall [app name]`, can uninstall the app.
        also can run in a local app' dir, the same as `install`.
        Use `hi uninstall hi`, can uninstall the hikit.
menu_uninstall_desc.cn:
使用 `hi uninstall [app name]`, 可以卸载工具.
        同样可以在工具源码根目录下执行，同 `install`.
        使用 `hi uninstall hi`, 会卸载hikit本身.

menu_create_help.desc: Provide template for create app and list.
menu_create_help.en: Provide template for create app and list.
menu_create_help.cn: 通过模版快速创建工具或源。

menu_create_desc.desc:
Use `hi create [name]` will create a normal app template in
        current dir.
        Use `hi create --basic [name]` will create a python module
        template in current dir.
        Use `hi create --list [name]` will create a app list template
        in current dir.
menu_create_desc.en:
Use `hi create [name]` will create a normal app template in
        current dir.
        Use `hi create --basic [name]` will create a python module
        template in current dir.
        Use `hi create --list [name]` will create a app list template
        in current dir.
menu_create_desc.cn:
使用 `hi create [name]` 会创建一个普通工具
        在当前目录.
        使用 `hi create --basic [name]` 会创建一个python module
        在当前目录.
        使用 `hi create --list [name]` 会创建一个源
        在当前目录.

menu_publish_help.desc: Publish app to list, will create a branch and push. (Need merge by hand.)
menu_publish_help.en: Publish app to list, will create a branch and push. (Need merge by hand.)
menu_publish_help.cn: 发布工具到源，会自动push。可能需要手动管理。

menu_publish_desc.desc:
In the developing app's dir, use `hi publish`,
        will publish this tool to hikit's app list,
        and then create a new branch push to the list source,
        need merge it to master by hand.

        NOTE, if app's infomation change also need to publish again.
menu_publish_desc.en:
In the developing app's dir, use `hi publish`,
        will publish this tool to hikit's app list,
        and then create a new branch push to the list source,
        need merge it to master by hand.

        NOTE, if app's infomation change also need to publish again.
menu_publish_desc.cn:
在工具源码根目录使用 `hi publish`,
        会发布该工具到当前的源中,
        并自动上传,
        可能需要手动管理.

        注意:如果工具的信息发生了变更, 最好同步更新源.

menu_publish_group_desc.desc: Publish app to a exist group
menu_publish_group_desc.en: Publish app to a exist group

menu_alias_help.cn: 用于创建命令的快捷别名

menu_alias_desc.desc: Use `hi alias [command] [alias]` can make alias for command.
menu_alias_desc.en: Use `hi alias [command] [alias]` can make alias for command.
menu_alias_desc.cn: 使用 `hi alias [command] [alias]` 可以创建命令的快捷别名.

menu_reset_alias_desc.desc: Use `hi reset-alias` will clean all defined alias.
menu_reset_alias_desc.en: Use `hi reset-alias` will clean all defined alias.
menu_reset_alias_desc.cn: 使用 `hi reset-alias` 会清空所有别名

menu_lang_set_desc.desc: Change language, default is en. cn is Chinese
menu_lang_set_desc.en: Change language, default is en. cn is Chinese
menu_lang_set_desc.cn: 改变语言, 默认为en。cn为中文。

menu_lang_generate_desc.desc: Generate multi lang file for the project.
menu_lang_generate_desc.en: Generate multi lang file for the project.
menu_lang_generate_desc.cn: 为该工具生成多语言文件。

menu_dev_desc.desc:
For clean cache,
        Use `hi dev --pyclean` will clean all python cache.

        For Release note,
        Use `hi dev --major [desc]` will update the first version number.
        Use `hi dev --feature [desc]` will update the second version number.
        Use `hi dev --bugfix [desc]` will update the third version number.
menu_dev_desc.en:
For clean cache,
        Use `hi dev --pyclean` will clean all python cache.

        For Release note,
        Use `hi dev --major [desc]` will update the first version number.
        Use `hi dev --feature [desc]` will update the second version number.
        Use `hi dev --bugfix [desc]` will update the third version number.
menu_dev_desc.cn:
用于清空python编译缓存,
        使用 `hi dev --pyclean` 会清理目录下所有python编译缓存.

        For Release note,
        Use `hi dev --major [desc]` will update the first version number.
        Use `hi dev --feature [desc]` will update the second version number.
        Use `hi dev --bugfix [desc]` will update the third version number.

menu_log_desc.desc:
For log level control.
        Use `hi log --debug` will change to debug level.
        Other same as above
menu_log_desc.en:
For log level control.
        Use `hi log --debug` will change to debug level.
        Other same as above
menu_log_desc.cn:
日志等级控制。
        使用 `hi log --debug` 会改变日志等级为debug.
        其他类似。
